                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       accommodation has been initiated and it is envisaged to take
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          about a year to conclude.

                                                                                                                            Resource Manager and IT Officer                                                                                                    (Pty) Ltd, a service provider that was previously appointed to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             investigate the maladministration of PESP 1 funding which was
